titleInfo.title: 'The dynasty of the Kajars translated from the original Persian manuscript presented by His Majesty Faty Aly Shah to Sir Harford Jones Brydges ... to which is prefixed a succinct account of the history of Persia previous to that period illustarted with plates and a map of Western Persia'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 223 mm x 140 mm.Pagination: initial Roman numeral pagination (i-cxci); (1-448).Condition: there are three fold-out.

mods.abstract: The dynasty of the Kajars translated from the original Persian manuscript presented by His Majesty Faty Aly Shah to Sir Harford Jones Brydges ... to which is prefixed a succinct account of the history of Persia previous to that period illustarted with plates and a map of Western Persia.Publication Details: Sutherland, London : John Bohn, 1833.The book is a translation by Harford Jones Brydges of Maʾāsir-i Sulṭānīyahby ʿAbd al-Razzāq ibn Najaf Qulī, contains illustrations and two maps representing 'Part of Azerbaeejan'Ownership: With stamps of the East India Company Library and India Office Library.
